entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Be more defensive when openssl by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/895
  • Header Images: fix cropping for users without the 'customize' capability by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/854
  • Follow Me/Followers: add inherit mode for dynamic templating by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/892
  • Enable Mastodon Apps: support profile editing, blog user by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/788
  • Add Screenshots of the Blocks by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/899
  • fix missing @ in Follow-Me block by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/898
  • Add replies collection by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/876
  • Content warnings! by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/900

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.2.5...3.3.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Keep priority of Icons (only change fallbacks) by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/903
  • Suggestion: Adopt WordPress PHP Coding Standards by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/905
  • PHPCS: Enable MissingShort Sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/910
  • PHPCS: Enable NonceVerification sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/908
  • PHPCS: Enable NotPrepared check by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/906
  • PHPCS: Enable GetMetaSingle sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/907
  • PHPCS: Enable LongNotCapital sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/913
  • PHPCS: Enable CommentedOutCode sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/914

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.1...3.3.2

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Update() activity ID is not unique by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/920
  • Prepare multi-lang support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/919
  • Fix phpdoc return type for transformer factory's get_transformer by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/921
  • PHPCS: Enable NoReservedKeywordParameterNames sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/909
  • Issue templates: add new issue type option by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/924
  • PHPCS: Enable UnusedFunctionParameter sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/911
  • PHPCS: Update workflow to fail on warnings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/927
  • Fix link regex by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/922
  • PHPCS: Enable Commenting sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/925
  • PHPCS: Include all files by default by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/930

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.2...3.3.3
